Questions.question: Mental Demand: How mentally demanding was the Inspection task?
Physical Demand: How physically demanding was the Inspection task?
Temporal Demand: How hurried or rushed was the pace of the Inspection task?
Performance: How successful were you in accomplishing the Inspection task you were asked to do?
Effort: How hard did you have to work to accomplish your level of performance?
Frustration: How insecure, discouraged, irritated, stressed, and annoyed were you?

I found the various features of this data visualization modality were well integrated.
I thought there was too much inconsistency in this data visualization modality.
